meanings.definition: A subatomic particle with no electric charge, found in the nucleus of an atom.
meanings.sent1: Neutrons are tiny particles inside the center of an atom.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study neutrons to understand atoms better.
meanings.sent3: The neutrons in the nucleus were known for their calm demeanor.
meanings.sent4: In the atomic dance, neutrons play the role of the silent observer.
meanings.sent5: Imagine neutrons as the quiet spectators of the atomic world.

meanings.definition: The neutral subatomic particle in an atomic nucleus.
meanings.sent1: Neutrons have no charge and are part of the nucleus.
meanings.sent2: The nucleus of an atom contains protons and neutrons.
meanings.sent3: The neutrons in the nucleus were the peacekeepers of the atomic family.
meanings.sent4: In the nucleus, neutrons act as the mediators between protons.
meanings.sent5: Visualize neutrons as the neutral negotiators within the nucleus.
